mapper.select: SELECT info.return_no, return_date, return_state_flag,return_quantity, line.ingred_no, ingred_name, ing_info.ingred_cate_no, ingred_cate_name ,rtl_prod_state_flag from ${branch_code}_return_info info JOIN ${branch_code}_return_line line ON info.return_no = line.return_no JOIN INGREDIENT_INFO ing_info ON ing_info.INGRED_NO = line.INGRED_NO JOIN INGREDIENT_CATE cate ON cate.INGRED_CATE_NO = ing_info.INGRED_CATE_NO ORDER BY info.return_no desc, line.ingred_no
